name: ReceptionHQ
description:
ReceptionHQ is a premium provider of Virtual Reception and Call Answering Services to clients ranging from sole traders and professionals to small business, government, not-for-profit and corporates. Established in 2003 in Australia as OfficeHQ, ReceptionHQ was launched in the US in 2007 and the UK in 2010.
ReceptionHQ provides our clients with a market leading, virtual receptionist and call answering service at a competitive, cost-effective price point.
